channel.title: portal 2 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Hop to it
item.description: 16:10 Wednesday 24 June 2015 JST I made what I think is a pretty neat Portal 2 level, but I’ve been unable to upload it to their servers due to some problem which results in “Error #25” or something equally helpful. It’s called “Hop to it” because it requires use of a springboard or two. I also made “Red button” which is just a tiny test room; before I knew how to change the dimensions of rooms.
